channel.title: How would i add a new command?

item.title: How would i add a new command?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“111”)) {
addItem(995, 1000);
}

Then the command will add 1000gp.

Yes, you can copy and paste and edit; but once you get used to coding you can probably just free-hand it faster.

Read full topic
item.source: How would i add a new command?

item.source: How would i add a new command?

item.title: How would i add a new command?
item.dc:creator: @Elven_Dremor Elven Dremor
item.description:
@Elven_Dremor wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(0, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(0, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sM(“Your Now A Pure SwadeScape Pker”);
}

Ok so say i wanna make a new command do i just do exactly like this but just change the pure thing and make it like gold, and additems?

Read full topic
